inactive-timer.help: Time interval(minutes) to be included in the inactive devices expiry calculation (mac age-out + inactive-time + periodic scan interval).
inactive-timer.name: inactive-timer

link-down-flush.help: Clear NAC and dynamic devices on switch ports on link down event.
link-down-flush.name: link-down-flush

options.help: Disable clearing NAC and dynamic devices on a switch port when link down event happens.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable clearing NAC and dynamic devices on a switch port when link down event happens.
options.name: enable

bounce-nac-port.help: Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port when NAC mode is configured on the port. Helps to re-initiate the DHCP process for a device.
bounce-nac-port.name: bounce-nac-port

options.help: Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port when NAC mode is configured.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port when NAC mode is configured.
options.name: enable

lan-segment.help: Enable/disable LAN segment feature on the FortiLink interface.
lan-segment.name: lan-segment

onboarding-vlan.help: Default NAC Onboarding VLAN when NAC devices are discovered.
onboarding-vlan.name: onboarding-vlan

results.help: Configure integrated FortiLink settings for FortiSwitch.
results.name: fortilink-settings
